original_text:
Be sure you know the condition of your flocks,
    give careful attention to your herds;
korean_text: 네 양 떼의 형편을 부지런히 살피며 네 소 떼에게 마음을 두라

sentences.original_text: Be sure you know the condition of your flocks
sentences.korean_translation: 네 양 떼의 형편을 반드시 알라

sentences.original_text: give careful attention to your herds
